forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and windy at times. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and windy at times. Rain becoming heavy at times late. Low 57F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 15C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain, possibly heavy at times early. Winds diminishing late. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 59F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
